values.comment: If you have more than 6 cards in your hand, you almost never want to play this.
If you have less than 4 cards in your hand, you almost always want to play this.
If there is an enemy minion with 5 or less HP on the board, you want to play this.
If you have less than 6 HP and more than 5 cards in your deck, you almost always want to play this.
If you have 7 minions on board, you likely don't want to play it.
